item.description:
October 31st 2009 - Saturday Night (Halloween Party)

Join us at JJ's Sports Bar for the annual Halloween Party.

Live Music and Dancing featuring No Alibi.

$5 club cover charge at the door.

Band starts around 9:30 PM.

From JJ's Web Site...
HALLOWEEN BASH SAT. THE 31ST!!
LIVE MUSIC WITH NO ALIBI!!!
GIVEAWAYS FOR THE BEST TRICK OR TREATERS!!!
COME DRESSED IN YOUR BEST COSTUME AND WIN $$$$ PRIZES!!
CASH PRIZE FOR BEST COUPLES COSTUMES!!
HELP US PICK THE WINNER FOR BEST EMPLOYEE COSTUME!!
ENJOY SOME SCARY MOVIES ON OUR MANY T.V.S!!
A FUN NIGHT YOU WON'T WANT TO MISS!!!
SEE YA' ON THE 31ST!!

JJ's is located at the junction of routes 9 and 20 at 380 SOUTHWEST CUTOFF IN NORTHBORO, MA 01532
item.name: JJ's Sports Bar Halloween Party with No Alibi
